policies.name: [Lagoon] Users role for group is Reporter
policies.description: Checks the users role for a group is Reporter or higher

policies.name: [Lagoon] User is owner of organization
policies.description: Checks that the user is owner of an organization via attribute

policies.name: Default Policy
policies.description: A policy that grants access only for users within this realm

policies.name: [Lagoon] Users role for project is Maintainer
policies.description: Checks the users role for a project is Maintainer or higher

policies.name: [Lagoon] User is viewer of organization

policies.name: [Lagoon] Users role for project is Owner

policies.name: [Lagoon] Users role for project is Guest
policies.description: Checks the users role for a project is Guest or higher

policies.name: [Lagoon] User has access to project

policies.description: Checks the users role for a project is Reporter or higher

policies.name: [Lagoon] User has access to own data
